posts.content: What about a section devoted to Devon vans? Every time someone posts anything about Devon interiors there seems to be loads of interest and the latest Split Screen Scene features Devons. Worth a try?

As a Devon owner I'm sympathetic to the idea but the sectioning of the site up into different models is a tricky one. A Barndoor only section was mooted a couple of years ago...
viewtopic.php?f=2&t=31009

It was thought at the time that there would not be enough traffic through the section to warrant it and at the time I agreed .

It can also be very contentious when you play with sections of the forum, just ask Dipsy.....
viewtopic.php?f=2&t=22083


But.... it's always worth raising the subject again (and the new version of the forum software means we can do a better job of doing it). Anyone else with any thoughts?

John

Can we have a Norfolk section as well?

Come to think of it why not have sections for all counties. Why should Devon have their own
